fields.Title of Presentation: Special Collections and Archives Reference Services
fields.Description/Abstract: Why do patrons come to Special Collections and Archives? What questions do they ask? What are their research topics? What services does the unit provide? This session will take the mystery out of Special Collections and Archives. Cheryl will provide an overview of patrons, topics, and services from start to finish. She'll cover rules, copyright issues, virtual reference, photocopies, scans, digital cameras, preparations, forms, retrieval, props, confidentiality, and monitoring as well as what statistics are gathered and how they're used.
